trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There was one other sighting in Redding on or around August 16th 2012
divs: Sighting Details1. Driving down Market Street. 2. White firey object falling from the sky. 3. Shooting star. 4. Fell from the sky. 5. Shock and surprise. I slowed the car down. 6. Burned up and disappeared.
Summary: White and red firey object falls from sky to the the north in Redding, CA
